name: Amy's Italian Skillet
ingredients: 1/2 red bell pepper, chopped, about 4 ounces
1/4 cup freshly grated parmesan cheese, optional, 1 ounce

instructions.en: Brown the turkey or chicken in a large skillet; drain.
instructions.sk: Opečte morku alebo kura vo veľkej panvici do hneda; zlejte tuk.
instructions.ja: 大きなフライパンで七面鳥または鶏肉のひき肉を炒めて茶色くし、油を切ります。

instructions.en: Add the onions and peppers and cook until tender.
instructions.sk: Pridajte cibuľu a papriky a varte, kým nezmäknú.
instructions.ja: 玉ねぎとピーマンを加え、柔らかくなるまで調理します。

instructions.en: Add the tomato sauce, Splenda (if using), and spices to taste. Simmer until heated through.
instructions.sk: Pridajte paradajkovú omáčku, Splendu (ak používate) a korenie podľa chuti. Varte na miernom ohni, kým sa nezahreje.
instructions.ja: トマトソース、スプレンダ（使用する場合）、スパイスを好みで加え、温まるまで煮込みます。

instructions.en: Sprinkle with parmesan cheese, if desired.
instructions.ja: お好みでパルメザンチーズをふりかけます。

notes: Makes 4 servings. Can be frozen. Frozen chopped peppers can be used. The parmesan cheese is optional and adds about 1/4 carb per serving.
